context_bundle.summary: Terraform is an infrastructure as code tool that enables safe, predictable infrastructure changes across multiple cloud providers

onboarding.quick_start: terraform init && terraform plan && terraform apply -auto-approve && terraform state list
common_patterns: Initialization: terraform init to download provider plugins and configure backend
Planning: terraform plan -out=tfplan to generate execution plan and save to file
Deployment: terraform apply tfplan to execute planned changes exactly as reviewed
State management: terraform state mv aws_instance.old aws_instance.new to rename resources
Remote backend: backend 's3' { bucket = 'terraform-state' key = 'prod/terraform.tfstate' region = 'us-east-1' }
known_errors: Provider not found: 'terraform init -upgrade' and verify required_providers block in main.tf
State lock error: 'terraform force-unlock LOCK_ID' after verifying no other terraform processes running
Resource drift: 'terraform plan -detailed-exitcode' and 'terraform refresh' to reconcile state with reality
Validation failed: 'terraform validate' to check syntax and 'terraform fmt' to fix formatting issues
Backend configuration: 'terraform init -migrate-state' when changing backend configuration
